item.title: Fugitive Dog Is New Orleans Folk Hero After Eluding Dart Guns And Nets
item.description: Scrim, a 17-pound mutt that's mostly terrier, has inspired tattoos, T-shirts and even a ballad as he eludes capture from the posse of volunteers.

item.title: New Zealander Wins Spanish World Scrabble Title Without Knowing Language
item.description: Nigel Richards started memorizing the language's Scrabble word list a year ago.

item.title: UK Spy Agency Uses Annual Christmas Card Puzzle To Find Future Codebreakers
item.description: Britain's spy agency is celebrating the festive season with a riddle wrapped in an enigma inside a mystery.
